questions.author: Bonny Miller
questions.title: What's with all the dependencies
questions.body: When I look at github in my project I see thousands of files loaded. It's only a few kilobytes but why are there so many little files?

questions.author: Jack Benny
questions.title: Is programming on Windows reasonable?
questions.body: This is a call out to people who have programmed on both Mac and Windows. I want to know if the focus of programmig will be on web and Android is it reasonable to program on Windows or is Mac the recommended platform?

questions.author: Jack Black
questions.title: What is the future for ReactJS developers?
questions.body: If a person is only a Reactjs developer, should they worry. Or if the person is only angularjs developer, should they worry?

comments.content: Donâ€™t learn the framework. Be the JavaScript Developer. You would have a piece of mind.
comments.author: Bixby

comments.content: Enough of Philosophy. Reactjs will also be turned down by some other framework (somewhere near the future). I think Angular 2 is again competing with it.
comments.author: Daniel
